txt.en: Wanted: Broken halberds from the Men and goblins throughout the Bruinen Source. \n\nThe dwarves of the Misty Mountains have requested a collection of broken halberds.
You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.

'There are Men here in the mountains that have come from Angmar for some uncertain reason. It is clear that they and the goblins are dangerously close to aligning. We must stop them both. Bring me proof in the form of their broken weapons or sword sheaths.'
The dwarves of the Misty Mountains have requested a collection of broken halberds.
Deliver the broken halberds to Larus Sharpshard at Gl√≥in's Camp in the Misty Mountains
Collection boxes for this task can be found at the camps within the Misty Mountains.\n\nYou should bring the trophies you gathered to a collection box.
Wanted: Broken halberds from the Men and goblins throughout the Bruinen Source.
Collect broken halberds and drop them in a collection box ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
